sect1.title: Comments
sect1.para: Template comments are surrounded by asterisks, and that is surrounded by the delimiter tags like so: {* this is a comment *} Smarty comments are NOT displayed in the final output of the template, unlike <!-- HTML comments --> They are useful for making internal notes in the templates.

example.title: Comments
example.programlisting:
<body>
{* this multiline
    comment is
   not sent to browser
*}

{* include the header file here *}
{include file="header.tpl"}


{* Dev note:  $includeFile is assigned foo.php script  *}
<!-- this html comment is sent to browser -->
{include file=$includeFile}

{include file=#includeFile#}

{* display dropdown lists *}
<select name="company">
  {html_options options=$vals selected=$selected_id}
</select>
</body>
